pages.text: Artifacts are curios equipments that boost player stats such as max health and attack, and provide special buffs when certain conditions are met. $(br2)By collecting powerful artifacts that pair well with each other, player can gain massive advantage in battles against strong enemies.

Artifacts belong to certain set and slot. The slots include Head, Body, Necklace, Bracelet, and Belt. Not all sets will have one artifact for each slots, but most sets do. $(br2)Artifacts also have ranks and levels. Ranks determines the quality of the artifacts. Level of artifacts can be increased through upgrading.
